title: Peaches and Cream Overnight Oatmeal
directions: In a small saucepan, heat up coconut oil over medium heat. Add diced peaches and vanilla to the heated pan and begin to sauté until they begin to break down a little and juice out its natural sugars - about 2-3 minutes. Add maple syrup, stir to combine and cook for another minute, remove from heat.
Divide ¼ cup steel oats or old fashioned oats, ½ teaspoon ground flax, and ½ cup milk inside 4 glass mason jars. Divide cooked peach mixture evenly inside each glass jar.
Stir to combine and refrigerate overnight.
ingredients: 3 very ripe peaches, sliced and diced small
1 cup steel cut oats or old fashioned oats
